lines.text:
[to Rebecca]
You are the most beautiful girl I have ever met. And I thought that even before I met you! Girls like you are not supposed to go out with guys like me, they're supposed to go out with Jerry Wakowskis. Guys who are captains of basketball teams and guys who can drive stick shifts and... guys who wear size 42 tuxedos... and who would never rip off your dress unless... maybe you wanted him to.
